dn9:1.2: ekam samayam bhagava savatthiyam viharati jetavane anathapindikassa arame.
dn9:1.3: Tena kho pana samayena potthapado paribbajako samayappavadake tindukacire ekasalake mallikaya arame pativasati mahatiya paribbajakaparisaya saddhim timsamattehi paribbajakasatehi.
dn9:1.4: Atha kho bhagava pubbanhasamayam nivasetva pattacivaramadaya savatthim pindaya pavisi.
dn9:2.3: Yannunaham yena samayappavadako tindukaciro ekasalako mallikaya aramo, yena potthapado paribbajako tenupasankameyyan”ti.
dn9:2.4: Atha kho bhagava yena samayappavadako tindukaciro ekasalako mallikaya aramo tenupasankami.
dn9:3.1: Tena kho pana samayena potthapado paribbajako mahatiya paribbajakaparisaya saddhim nisinno hoti unnadiniya uccasaddamahasaddaya anekavihitam tiracchanakatham kathentiya.
dn9:3.2: Seyyathidam—rajakatham corakatham mahamattakatham senakatham bhayakatham yuddhakatham annakatham panakatham vatthakatham sayanakatham malakatham gandhakatham natikatham yanakatham gamakatham nigamakatham nagarakatham janapadakatham itthikatham surakatham visikhakatham kumbhatthanakatham pubbapetakatham nanattakatham lokakkhayikam samuddakkhayikam itibhavabhavakatham iti va.
dn9:4.1: Addasa kho potthapado paribbajako bhagavantam duratova agacchantam;
dn9:4.5: Appasaddakamo kho so ayasma appasaddassa vannavadi.
dn9:4.6: Appeva nama appasaddam parisam viditva upasankamitabbam manneyya”ti.
dn9:4.7: Evam vutte, te paribbajaka tunhi ahesum.
dn9:5.1: Atha kho bhagava yena potthapado paribbajako tenupasankami.
dn9:5.2: Atha kho potthapado paribbajako bhagavantam etadavoca:
dn9:5.5: Cirassam kho, bhante, bhagava imam pariyayamakasi, yadidam idhagamanaya.
dn9:5.6: Nisidatu, bhante, bhagava, idam asanam pannattan”ti.
dn9:5.8: Potthapadopi kho paribbajako annataram nicam asanam gahetva ekamantam nisidi.
dn9:5.9: Ekamantam nisinnam kho potthapadam paribbajakam bhagava etadavoca:
dn9:5.10: “kaya nuttha, potthapada, etarahi kathaya sannisinna, ka ca pana vo antarakatha vippakata”ti?
dn9:6.1: Evam vutte, potthapado paribbajako bhagavantam etadavoca:
dn9:6.2: “titthatesa, bhante, katha, yaya mayam etarahi kathaya sannisinna.
dn9:6.3: Nesa, bhante, katha bhagavato dullabha bhavissati pacchapi savanaya.
dn9:6.4: Purimani, bhante, divasani purimatarani, nanatitthiyanam samanabrahmananam kotuhalasalaya sannisinnanam sannipatitanam abhisannanirodhe katha udapadi:
dn9:6.8: Yasmim samaye uppajjanti, sanni tasmim samaye hoti.
dn9:6.9: Yasmim samaye nirujjhanti, asanni tasmim samaye hoti’ti.
dn9:6.12: ‘na kho pana metam, bho, evam bhavissati.
dn9:6.15: Yasmim samaye upeti, sanni tasmim samaye hoti.
dn9:6.16: Yasmim samaye apeti, asanni tasmim samaye hoti’ti.
dn9:6.19: ‘na kho pana metam, bho, evam bhavissati.
dn9:6.20: Santi hi, bho, samanabrahmana mahiddhika mahanubhava.
dn9:6.21: Te imassa purisassa sannam upakaddhantipi apakaddhantipi.
dn9:6.22: Yasmim samaye upakaddhanti, sanni tasmim samaye hoti.
dn9:6.23: Yasmim samaye apakaddhanti, asanni tasmim samaye hoti’ti.
dn9:6.26: ‘na kho pana metam, bho, evam bhavissati.
dn9:6.27: Santi hi, bho, devata mahiddhika mahanubhava.
dn9:6.28: Ta imassa purisassa sannam upakaddhantipi apakaddhantipi.
dn9:6.29: Yasmim samaye upakaddhanti, sanni tasmim samaye hoti.
dn9:6.30: Yasmim samaye apakaddhanti, asanni tasmim samaye hoti’ti.
dn9:6.32: Tassa mayham, bhante, bhagavantamyeva arabbha sati udapadi:
dn9:6.33: ‘aho nuna bhagava, aho nuna sugato, yo imesam dhammanam sukusalo’ti.
dn9:6.34: Bhagava, bhante, kusalo, bhagava pakatannu abhisannanirodhassa.
dn9:6.35: Katham nu kho, bhante, abhisannanirodho hoti”ti?
dn9:7.2: ‘ahetu appaccaya purisassa sanna uppajjantipi nirujjhantipi’ti, aditova tesam aparaddham.
dn9:7.4: Sahetu hi, potthapada, sappaccaya purisassa sanna uppajjantipi nirujjhantipi.
dn9:7.5: Sikkha eka sanna uppajjati, sikkha eka sanna nirujjhati.
dn9:7.7: “Idha, potthapada, tathagato loke uppajjati araham, sammasambuddho …pe…
dn9:7.8: Evam kho, potthapada, bhikkhu silasampanno hoti
dn9:9.1: tassime pancanivarane pahine attani samanupassato pamojjam jayati, pamuditassa piti jayati, pitimanassa kayo passambhati, passaddhakayo sukham vedeti, sukhino cittam samadhiyati.
dn9:10.1: So vivicceva kamehi, vivicca akusalehi dhammehi, savitakkam savicaram vivekajam pitisukham pathamam jhanam upasampajja viharati.
dn9:10.2: Tassa ya purima kamasanna, sa nirujjhati.
dn9:10.3: Vivekajapitisukhasukhumasaccasanna tasmim samaye hoti, vivekajapitisukhasukhumasaccasanniyeva tasmim samaye hoti.
dn9:10.4: Evampi sikkha eka sanna uppajjati, sikkha eka sanna nirujjhati.
dn9:11.1: “Puna caparam, potthapada, bhikkhu vitakkavicaranam vupasama ajjhattam sampasadanam cetaso ekodibhavam avitakkam avicaram samadhijam pitisukham dutiyam jhanam upasampajja viharati.
dn9:11.2: Tassa ya purima vivekajapitisukhasukhumasaccasanna, sa nirujjhati.
dn9:11.3: Samadhijapitisukhasukhumasaccasanna tasmim samaye hoti, samadhijapitisukhasukhumasaccasanniyeva tasmim samaye hoti.
dn9:11.4: Evampi sikkha eka sanna uppajjati, sikkha eka sanna nirujjhati.
dn9:12.1: “Puna caparam, potthapada, bhikkhu pitiya ca viraga upekkhako ca viharati sato ca sampajano, sukhanca kayena patisamvedeti, yam tam ariya acikkhanti: ‘upekkhako satima sukhavihari’ti, tatiyam jhanam upasampajja viharati.
dn9:12.2: Tassa ya purima samadhijapitisukhasukhumasaccasanna, sa nirujjhati.
dn9:12.3: Upekkhasukhasukhumasaccasanna tasmim samaye hoti, upekkhasukhasukhumasaccasanniyeva tasmim samaye hoti.
dn9:12.4: Evampi sikkha eka sanna uppajjati, sikkha eka sanna nirujjhati.
dn9:13.1: “Puna caparam, potthapada, bhikkhu sukhassa ca pahana dukkhassa ca pahana pubbeva somanassadomanassanam atthangama adukkhamasukham upekkhasatiparisuddhim catuttham jhanam upasampajja viharati.
dn9:13.2: Tassa ya purima upekkhasukhasukhumasaccasanna, sa nirujjhati.
dn9:13.3: Adukkhamasukhasukhumasaccasanna tasmim samaye hoti, adukkhamasukhasukhumasaccasanniyeva tasmim samaye hoti.
dn9:13.4: Evampi sikkha eka sanna uppajjati, sikkha eka sanna nirujjhati.
dn9:14.1: “Puna caparam, potthapada, bhikkhu sabbaso rupasannanam samatikkama patighasannanam atthangama nanattasannanam amanasikara ‘ananto akaso’ti akasanancayatanam upasampajja viharati.
dn9:14.2: Tassa ya purima rupasanna, sa nirujjhati.
dn9:14.3: Akasanancayatanasukhumasaccasanna tasmim samaye hoti, akasanancayatanasukhumasaccasanniyeva tasmim samaye hoti.
dn9:14.4: Evampi sikkha eka sanna uppajjati, sikkha eka sanna nirujjhati.
dn9:15.1: “Puna caparam, potthapada, bhikkhu sabbaso akasanancayatanam samatikkamma ‘anantam vinnanan’ti vinnanancayatanam upasampajja viharati.
dn9:15.2: Tassa ya purima akasanancayatanasukhumasaccasanna, sa nirujjhati.
dn9:15.3: Vinnanancayatanasukhumasaccasanna tasmim samaye hoti, vinnanancayatanasukhumasaccasanniyeva tasmim samaye hoti.
dn9:15.4: Evampi sikkha eka sanna uppajjati, sikkha eka sanna nirujjhati.
dn9:16.1: “Puna caparam, potthapada, bhikkhu sabbaso vinnanancayatanam samatikkamma ‘natthi kinci’ti akincannayatanam upasampajja viharati.
dn9:16.2: Tassa ya purima vinnanancayatanasukhumasaccasanna, sa nirujjhati.
dn9:16.3: Akincannayatanasukhumasaccasanna tasmim samaye hoti, akincannayatanasukhumasaccasanniyeva tasmim samaye hoti.
dn9:16.4: Evampi sikkha eka sanna uppajjati, sikkha eka sanna nirujjhati.
dn9:17.1: “Yato kho, potthapada, bhikkhu idha sakasanni hoti, so tato amutra tato amutra anupubbena sannaggam phusati.
dn9:17.4: Ahanceva kho pana ceteyyam, abhisankhareyyam, ima ca me sanna nirujjheyyum, anna ca olarika sanna uppajjeyyum;
dn9:17.5: yannunaham na ceva ceteyyam na ca abhisankhareyyan’ti.
dn9:17.6: So na ceva ceteti, na ca abhisankharoti.
dn9:17.7: Tassa acetayato anabhisankharoto ta ceva sanna nirujjhanti, anna ca olarika sanna na uppajjanti.
dn9:18.2: api nu te ito pubbe evarupa anupubbabhisannanirodhasampajanasamapatti sutapubba”ti?
dn9:18.4: Evam kho aham, bhante, bhagavato bhasitam ajanami:
dn9:18.5: ‘yato kho, potthapada, bhikkhu idha sakasanni hoti, so tato amutra tato amutra anupubbena sannaggam phusati,
dn9:18.8: Ahanceva kho pana ceteyyam abhisankhareyyam, ima ca me sanna nirujjheyyum, anna ca olarika sanna uppajjeyyum;
dn9:18.9: yannunaham na ceva ceteyyam, na ca abhisankhareyyan”ti.
dn9:18.10: So na ceva ceteti, na cabhisankharoti, tassa acetayato anabhisankharoto ta ceva sanna nirujjhanti, anna ca olarika sanna na uppajjanti.
dn9:19.1: “Ekanneva nu kho, bhante, bhagava sannaggam pannapeti, udahu puthupi sannagge pannapeti”ti?
dn9:19.2: “Ekampi kho aham, potthapada, sannaggam pannapemi, puthupi sannagge pannapemi”ti.
dn9:19.3: “Yatha katham pana, bhante, bhagava ekampi sannaggam pannapeti, puthupi sannagge pannapeti”ti?
dn9:19.4: “Yatha yatha kho, potthapada, nirodham phusati tatha tathaham sannaggam pannapemi.
dn9:19.5: Evam kho aham, potthapada, ekampi sannaggam pannapemi, puthupi sannagge pannapemi”ti.
dn9:20.1: “Sanna nu kho, bhante, pathamam uppajjati, paccha nanam, udahu nanam pathamam uppajjati, paccha sanna, udahu sanna ca nananca apubbam acarimam uppajjanti”ti?
dn9:20.2: “Sanna kho, potthapada, pathamam uppajjati, paccha nanam, sannuppada ca pana nanuppado hoti.
dn9:20.5: Imina kho etam, potthapada, pariyayena veditabbam—
dn9:20.6: yatha sanna pathamam uppajjati, paccha nanam, sannuppada ca pana nanuppado hoti”ti.
dn9:21.1: “Sanna nu kho, bhante, purisassa atta, udahu anna sanna anno atta”ti?
dn9:21.3: “Olarikam kho aham, bhante, attanam paccemi rupim catumahabhutikam kabalikaraharabhakkhan”ti.
dn9:21.4: “Olariko ca hi te, potthapada, atta abhavissa rupi catumahabhutiko kabalikaraharabhakkho. Evam santam kho te, potthapada, annava sanna bhavissati anno atta.
dn9:21.5: Tadaminapetam, potthapada, pariyayena veditabbam yatha annava sanna bhavissati anno atta.
dn9:21.6: Titthateva sayam, potthapada, olariko atta rupi catumahabhutiko kabalikaraharabhakkho, atha imassa purisassa anna ca sanna uppajjanti, anna ca sanna nirujjhanti.
dn9:21.7: Imina kho etam, potthapada, pariyayena veditabbam yatha annava sanna bhavissati anno atta”ti.
dn9:22.1: “Manomayam kho aham, bhante, attanam paccemi sabbangapaccangim ahinindriyan”ti.
dn9:22.2: “Manomayo ca hi te, potthapada, atta abhavissa sabbangapaccangi ahinindriyo, evam santampi kho te, potthapada, annava sanna bhavissati anno atta.
dn9:22.3: Tadaminapetam, potthapada, pariyayena veditabbam yatha annava sanna bhavissati anno atta.
dn9:22.4: Titthateva sayam, potthapada, manomayo atta sabbangapaccangi ahinindriyo, atha imassa purisassa anna ca sanna uppajjanti, anna ca sanna nirujjhanti.
dn9:22.5: Iminapi kho etam, potthapada, pariyayena veditabbam yatha annava sanna bhavissati anno atta”ti.
dn9:23.1: “Arupim kho aham, bhante, attanam paccemi sannamayan”ti.
dn9:23.2: “Arupi ca hi te, potthapada, atta abhavissa sannamayo, evam santampi kho te, potthapada, annava sanna bhavissati anno atta.
dn9:23.3: Tadaminapetam, potthapada, pariyayena veditabbam yatha annava sanna bhavissati anno atta.
dn9:23.4: Titthateva sayam, potthapada, arupi atta sannamayo, atha imassa purisassa anna ca sanna uppajjanti, anna ca sanna nirujjhanti.
dn9:23.5: Iminapi kho etam, potthapada, pariyayena veditabbam yatha annava sanna bhavissati anno atta”ti.
dn9:24.2: ‘sanna purisassa atta’ti va ‘annava sanna anno atta’ti va”ti?
dn9:24.3: “Dujjanam kho etam, potthapada, taya annaditthikena annakhantikena annarucikena annatrayogena annatracariyakena:
dn9:24.4: ‘sanna purisassa atta’ti va, ‘annava sanna anno attati’ va”ti.
dn9:25.1: “Sacetam, bhante, maya dujjanam annaditthikena annakhantikena annarucikena annatrayogena annatracariyakena:
dn9:25.2: ‘sanna purisassa atta’ti va, ‘annava sanna anno atta’ti va;
dn9:25.3: kim pana, bhante, ‘sassato loko, idameva saccam moghamannan’”ti?
dn9:26.1: “Kim pana, bhante, ‘asassato loko, idameva saccam moghamannan’”ti?
dn9:27.7: ‘hoti ca na ca hoti tathagato param marana …
dn9:27.8: ‘neva hoti na na hoti tathagato param marana, idameva saccam moghamannan’”ti?
dn9:27.10: ‘neva hoti na na hoti tathagato param marana, idameva saccam moghamannan’”ti.
dn9:28.2: “Na hetam, potthapada, atthasamhitam na dhammasamhitam nadibrahmacariyakam, na nibbidaya na viragaya na nirodhaya na upasamaya na abhinnaya na sambodhaya na nibbanaya samvattati,
dn9:29.2: “Idam dukkhanti kho, potthapada, maya byakatam. Ayam dukkhasamudayoti kho, potthapada, maya byakatam. Ayam dukkhanirodhoti kho, potthapada, maya byakatam. Ayam dukkhanirodhagamini patipadati kho, potthapada, maya byakatan”ti.
dn9:30.2: “Etanhi, potthapada, atthasamhitam, etam dhammasamhitam, etam adibrahmacariyakam, etam nibbidaya viragaya nirodhaya upasamaya abhinnaya sambodhaya nibbanaya samvattati;
dn9:31.1: Atha kho te paribbajaka acirapakkantassa bhagavato potthapadam paribbajakam samantato vaca sannitodakena sanjhabbharimakamsu:
dn9:31.2: “evameva panayam bhavam potthapado yannadeva samano gotamo bhasati, tam tadevassa abbhanumodati:
dn9:31.4: Na kho pana mayam kinci samanassa gotamassa ekamsikam dhammam desitam ajanama:
dn9:31.5: ‘sassato loko’ti va, ‘asassato loko’ti va, ‘antava loko’ti va, ‘anantava loko’ti va, ‘tam jivam tam sariran’ti va, ‘annam jivam annam sariran’ti va, ‘hoti tathagato param marana’ti va, ‘na hoti tathagato param marana’ti va, ‘hoti ca na ca hoti tathagato param marana’ti va, ‘neva hoti na na hoti tathagato param marana’ti va”ti.
dn9:31.6: Evam vutte, potthapado paribbajako te paribbajake etadavoca:
dn9:31.7: “ahampi kho, bho, na kinci samanassa gotamassa ekamsikam dhammam desitam ajanami:
dn9:31.9: ‘neva hoti na na hoti tathagato param marana’ti va;
dn9:31.10: api ca samano gotamo bhutam taccham tatham patipadam pannapeti dhammatthitatam dhammaniyamatam.
dn9:31.11: Bhutam kho pana taccham tatham patipadam pannapentassa dhammatthitatam dhammaniyamatam, kathanhi nama madiso vinnu samanassa gotamassa subhasitam subhasitato nabbhanumodeyya”ti?
dn9:32.1: Atha kho dvihatihassa accayena citto ca hatthisariputto potthapado ca paribbajako yena bhagava tenupasankamimsu; upasankamitva citto hatthisariputto bhagavantam abhivadetva ekamantam nisidi.
dn9:32.2: Potthapado pana paribbajako bhagavata saddhim sammodi. Sammodaniyam katham saraniyam vitisaretva ekamantam nisidi.
dn9:32.3: Ekamantam nisinno kho potthapado paribbajako bhagavantam etadavoca:
dn9:32.4: “tada mam, bhante, te paribbajaka acirapakkantassa bhagavato samantato vacasannitodakena sanjhabbharimakamsu:
dn9:32.5: ‘evameva panayam bhavam potthapado yannadeva samano gotamo bhasati, tam tadevassa abbhanumodati:
dn9:32.7: Na kho pana mayam kinci samanassa gotamassa ekamsikam dhammam desitam ajanama:
dn9:32.8: “sassato loko”ti va, “asassato loko”ti va, “antava loko”ti va, “anantava loko”ti va, “tam jivam tam sariran”ti va, “annam jivam annam sariran”ti va, “hoti tathagato param marana”ti va, “na hoti tathagato param marana”ti va, “hoti ca na ca hoti tathagato param marana”ti va, “neva hoti na na hoti tathagato param marana”ti va’ti.
dn9:32.9: Evam vuttaham, bhante, te paribbajake etadavocam:
dn9:32.10: ‘ahampi kho, bho, na kinci samanassa gotamassa ekamsikam dhammam desitam ajanami:
dn9:32.12: “neva hoti na na hoti tathagato param marana”ti va;
dn9:32.13: api ca samano gotamo bhutam taccham tatham patipadam pannapeti dhammatthitatam dhammaniyamatam.
dn9:32.14: Bhutam kho pana taccham tatham patipadam pannapentassa dhammatthitatam dhammaniyamatam, kathanhi nama madiso vinnu samanassa gotamassa subhasitam subhasitato nabbhanumodeyya’”ti?
dn9:33.1: “Sabbeva kho ete, potthapada, paribbajaka andha acakkhuka;
dn9:33.3: Ekamsikapi hi kho, potthapada, maya dhamma desita pannatta;
dn9:33.4: anekamsikapi hi kho, potthapada, maya dhamma desita pannatta.
dn9:33.5: Katame ca te, potthapada, maya anekamsika dhamma desita pannatta?
dn9:33.6: ‘Sassato loko’ti kho, potthapada, maya anekamsiko dhammo desito pannatto;
dn9:33.7: ‘asassato loko’ti kho, potthapada, maya anekamsiko dhammo desito pannatto;
dn9:33.13: na hoti tathagato param marana’ti kho, potthapada …
dn9:33.14: ‘hoti ca na ca hoti tathagato param marana’ti kho, potthapada …
dn9:33.15: ‘neva hoti na na hoti tathagato param marana’ti kho, potthapada, maya anekamsiko dhammo desito pannatto.
dn9:33.16: Kasma ca te, potthapada, maya anekamsika dhamma desita pannatta?
dn9:33.17: Na hete, potthapada, atthasamhita na dhammasamhita na adibrahmacariyaka na nibbidaya na viragaya na nirodhaya na upasamaya na abhinnaya na sambodhaya na nibbanaya samvattanti.
dn9:33.18: Tasma te maya anekamsika dhamma desita pannatta.
dn9:33.20: Katame ca te, potthapada, maya ekamsika dhamma desita pannatta?
dn9:33.21: Idam dukkhanti kho, potthapada, maya ekamsiko dhammo desito pannatto.
dn9:33.22: Ayam dukkhasamudayoti kho, potthapada, maya ekamsiko dhammo desito pannatto.
dn9:33.23: Ayam dukkhanirodhoti kho, potthapada, maya ekamsiko dhammo desito pannatto.
dn9:33.24: Ayam dukkhanirodhagamini patipadati kho, potthapada, maya ekamsiko dhammo desito pannatto.
dn9:33.25: Kasma ca te, potthapada, maya ekamsika dhamma desita pannatta?
dn9:33.26: Ete hi, potthapada, atthasamhita, ete dhammasamhita, ete adibrahmacariyaka ete nibbidaya viragaya nirodhaya upasamaya abhinnaya sambodhaya nibbanaya samvattanti.
dn9:33.27: Tasma te maya ekamsika dhamma desita pannatta.
dn9:34.1: Santi, potthapada, eke samanabrahmana evamvadino evamditthino:
dn9:34.6: Te ce me evam puttha ‘ama’ti patijananti.
dn9:34.8: ‘api pana tumhe ayasmanto ekantasukham lokam janam passam viharatha’ti?
dn9:34.11: ‘api pana tumhe ayasmanto ekam va rattim ekam va divasam upaddham va rattim upaddham va divasam ekantasukhim attanam sanjanatha’ti?
dn9:34.15: “ayam maggo ayam patipada ekantasukhassa lokassa sacchikiriyaya”’ti?
dn9:34.18: ‘api pana tumhe ayasmanto ya ta devata ekantasukham lokam upapanna, tasam bhasamananam saddam sunatha:
dn9:34.19: “suppatipannattha, marisa, ujuppatipannattha, marisa, ekantasukhassa lokassa sacchikiriyaya;
dn9:34.20: mayampi hi, marisa, evampatipanna ekantasukham lokam upapanna”’ti?
dn9:34.23: nanu evam sante tesam samanabrahmananam appatihirakatam bhasitam sampajjati”ti?

dn9:40.1: Olarikassapi kho aham, potthapada, attapatilabhassa pahanaya dhammam desemi:
dn9:40.2: ‘yathapatipannanam vo sankilesika dhamma pahiyissanti, vodaniya dhamma abhivaddhissanti, pannaparipurim vepullattanca dittheva dhamme sayam abhinna sacchikatva upasampajja viharissatha’ti.
dn9:40.3: Siya kho pana te, potthapada, evamassa:
dn9:40.4: ‘sankilesika dhamma pahiyissanti, vodaniya dhamma abhivaddhissanti, pannaparipurim vepullattanca dittheva dhamme sayam abhinna sacchikatva upasampajja viharissati, dukkho ca kho viharo’ti.
dn9:40.5: Na kho panetam, potthapada, evam datthabbam.
dn9:40.6: Sankilesika ceva dhamma pahiyissanti, vodaniya ca dhamma abhivaddhissanti, pannaparipurim vepullattanca dittheva dhamme sayam abhinna sacchikatva upasampajja viharissati, pamujjanceva bhavissati piti ca passaddhi ca sati ca sampajannanca sukho ca viharo.

dn9:49.1: “Yasmim, citta, samaye olariko attapatilabho hoti, neva tasmim samaye manomayo attapatilabhoti sankham gacchati, na arupo attapatilabhoti sankham gacchati;
dn9:49.2: olariko attapatilabhotveva tasmim samaye sankham gacchati.
dn9:49.3: Yasmim, citta, samaye manomayo attapatilabho hoti, neva tasmim samaye olariko attapatilabhoti sankham gacchati, na arupo attapatilabhoti sankham gacchati;
dn9:49.4: manomayo attapatilabhotveva tasmim samaye sankham gacchati.
dn9:49.5: Yasmim, citta, samaye arupo attapatilabho hoti, neva tasmim samaye olariko attapatilabhoti sankham gacchati, na manomayo attapatilabhoti sankham gacchati;
dn9:49.6: arupo attapatilabhotveva tasmim samaye sankham gacchati.
dn9:49.9: bhavissasi tvam anagatamaddhanam, na tvam na bhavissasi;
dn9:49.10: atthi tvam etarahi, na tvam natthi’ti.
dn9:49.11: Evam puttho tvam, citta, kinti byakareyyasi”ti?
dn9:49.13: ‘ahosi tvam atitamaddhanam, na tvam na ahosi;

dn9:49.20: Evam puttho aham, bhante, evam byakareyyan”ti.

dn9:56.1: Alattha kho citto hatthisariputto bhagavato santike pabbajjam, alattha upasampadam.
dn9:56.2: Acirupasampanno kho panayasma citto hatthisariputto eko vupakattho appamatto atapi pahitatto viharanto na cirasseva—yassatthaya kulaputta sammadeva agarasma anagariyam pabbajanti, tadanuttaram—brahmacariyapariyosanam dittheva dhamme sayam abhinna sacchikatva upasampajja vihasi.
dn9:56.3: “khina jati, vusitam brahmacariyam, katam karaniyam, naparam itthAttaya”ti abbhannasi.
dn9:56.4: Annataro kho panayasma citto hatthisariputto arahatam ahositi.
